metadata.title: ceil - Functions - Configuration Language
metadata.description:
The ceil function returns the closest whole number greater than or equal to
the given value.

metadata.title: Packer by HashiCorp
metadata.description: Packer helps you create golden images for multiple platforms from a single source configuration.
